1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import time
4 import rospy
5 import criros
6 import IPython
7 import openravepy
8 import numpy as np
9 from crinspect_openrave import planning
10 
11 openravepy.RaveSetDebugLevel(openravepy.DebugLevel.Error)
12 if __name__ == "__main__":
13 
14  file_name = 'crinspect_octomap'
15  topic_name = '/camera/depth/points'
16 
17  rospy.init_node('test_octomap', anonymous=True)
18  env = openravepy.Environment()
19  # env.Load('robots/denso_with_ftsensor.robot.xml')
20  env.Load('worlds/lab_demo.env.xml')
21  robot = env.GetRobot('robot')
22  robot.SetActiveDOFValues([0, -0.34906585, 2.26892803, 0, 1.22173048, 0])
23  # env.SetDefaultViewer()
24  env.SetViewer('qtcoin')
25 
26  env.Load(file_name + '.wrl')
27  octomap = env.GetKinBody(file_name)
28 
29  time_start = time.time()
30  env.CheckCollision(robot)
31  t = time.time()-time_start
32  print 'single collision_test time: {}'.format(t)
33 
34  print env.CheckCollision(robot)
35 
36  lower, upper = robot.GetActiveDOFLimits()
37  stop = False
38  while not stop:
39  if rospy.is_shutdown():
40  stop = True
41  try:
42  qgoal = lower+np.random.rand(len(lower))*(upper-lower)
43  print "qgoal: ", qgoal
44  traj = planning.plan_to_joint_configuration(robot, qgoal, planner='birrt', max_iters=200, max_ppiters=100)
45  print "planning finish."
46  if traj is None:
47  robot.SetActiveDOFValues([0, -0.34906585, 2.26892803, 0, 1.22173048, 0])
48  else:
49  controller = robot.GetController()
50  controller.SetPath(traj)
51  robot.WaitForController(0)
52  print 'trajectory execution finish'
53  except KeyboardInterrupt:
54  print 'Error encountered.'
55  # exit()
56 
57  IPython.embed()
58  exit()
